snippet: Home sales in Kuala Lumpur have been soft, in part because of political uncertainty and limits imposed on bank financing....
abstract: International House Hunting column; three-level contemporary house in Seputeh Heights, gated community in Malaysian capital of Kuala Lumpur, is listed at $3,130,000; information about market and tips for buying properties in Kuala Lumpur highlighted.
lead_paragraph: Home sales in Kuala Lumpur have been soft, in part because of political uncertainty and limits imposed on bank financing.
